sources.title: The Chinese Bungalow
sources.description: A dark and suspensefulÂ romantic drama set in '30s British Malaya. Notable for its bizarre miscasting of Hungarian Paul Lukas as a wealthy Chinese rubber planter. Good supporting cast. An adaptation of the play by Matheson Lang. IMDB rating 6.2. Produced and directed by George King. UK release 1940. US release 1941. Complete print a.k.a. "The Chinese Den" (US).

metadata.Plot: A wealthy Chinese banker marries a British singer and takes her back to his estate in the Malayan jungle. But his frequent absences on business make her feel abandoned and she has an affair with a nearby plantation owner. When the banker finds out, he plots his revenge with devastating results...
metadata.Writer: Arthur Barnes, James Corbett, Marian Osmond
metadata.Actors: Matheson Lang, Jill Esmond, Anna Neagle
